product_name: Timex Expedition Fast-Wrap Digital Watch - Women's
long_description: This water-resistant, multifunction watch for women features a chronograph and a Fast-Wrap(R) strap for easy wear. 100 hr. chronograph with lap and split options, 99-lap memory recall and a 24 hr. countdown timer. Three easy-to-set daily alarms keep you on schedule. Water-resistant to 100m (330 ft.). INDIGLO(R) night-light illuminates the display for easy use in the dark. Fast Wrap watch band offers subtle adjustability for the right fit over or under clothing.
short_description: This water-resistant, multifunction watch for women features a chronograph and a Fast-Wrap(R) strap for easy wear.
